summary:
Paraguay is a country in South America, surrounded by Argentina, Brazil, and Bolivia. It has a population of about 6.1 million, with many living in the capital, Asunci√≥n. Spanish explorers arrived in the 1500s, and the country gained independence in the 1800s. Paraguay has faced wars and dictatorships, but now has a democratic government.

It is a developing country with a unique culture, where most people speak both Guarani and Spanish. Paraguay is known for its happy population and is one of the few landlocked countries in South America, but it still has river access to the Atlantic Ocean.
title: Paraguay
